title: ORIGO Workshop
description: A two-day annual flagship workshop for NIT Calicut freshers, offering a hands-on introduction to robotics. The sessions cover coding, CAD modeling, electronics, and AI fundamentals, helping students design, build, and train their first robots

title: M.Tech Mechatronics Workshop
description: An annual workshop for M.Tech students, featuring lectures and hands-on sessions in the Mechatronics Lab. The program focuses on advanced robotics concepts including ROS (Robot Operating System), robot simulation, control systems, and sensor integration, offering participants practical exposure to research-level robotics.

title: National Workshop on Robotics and Control
description: A national workshop on Robotics and Control was organized by the Mechanical Engineering Department in association with the Robotics Society of India

title: UL Space Club Lecture
description: Conducted a one-day session on robotics at UL Cyber Park, which included an interactive lecture and a mini expo for school students. The event introduced them to basic robotics concepts, simple coding, and hands-on demonstrations, encouraging curiosity and interest in science and technology

title: Feroke GHSS 3-day Robotics Workshop
description: We conducted a 3-day workshop for the young students of Government HSS Feroke where we taught them basics of 3D printing, MIT App inventor, Scratch, CAD Modelling, Arduino, etc.
